```{r, output="asis"}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(here)

generate_markdown <- function(excel_path) {
  df <- read_excel(excel_path)
  
  df %>% 
    rowwise() %>%
    summarise(
      output = str_c(
        "::: {.feature}\n",
        "### {{< fa ", fa_icon, " >}} ", title, "\n",
        text, "\n\n",
        "::: {.learn-more}\n",
        "[", learn_more_text, " Â»](", link, ")\n",
        ":::\n:::"
      )
    ) %>%
    pull(output) %>%
    cat(sep = "\n")
}

# Replace 'path_to_your_excel_file.xlsx' with the actual path to your Excel file.
generate_markdown(here("inputs", "news.xlsx"))

```
